body_html:
It turns out I was actually looking into tensorflow because scipy was too slow. I don't know how you got your SVD in 5.6 seconds for a 4096x4096 matrix with scipy, but I got 232.7 seconds, and still only one core used.

Anyway, unless there is a way to turn a SVD to eigenvectors, this wouldn't be of much help. (I don't much about this, though.)

body:
It turns out I was actually looking into tensorflow because scipy was too slow. I don't know how you got your SVD in 5.6 seconds for a 4096x4096 matrix with scipy, but I got 232.7 seconds, and still only one core used.

Anyway, unless there is a way to turn a SVD to eigenvectors, this wouldn't be of much help. (I don't much about this, though.)
